tweets.text:
$VET has obtained the MiCAR license and onboarded Dana White as an advisor.

We discussed why this is crucial to get mass-adoption alongside #VeChain founder, 
@sunshinelu24
, in a new episode of the 
@new_era_finance
 podcast!

Watch it here:
https://youtu.be/YDfVFcb07A0

There's still a massive bullish divergence on $W.

Given that it's the weekly timeframe, it just simply takes time.

In the previous cycles, #Altcoins do a 'fake' run, and then they retest the previous low, where everybody shouts that there's no actual run and then the real run happens.

An example: $NEAR

Retesting its previous low and slowly crawling upwards.

$LINK retests its low against #Bitcoin and that has proven to be the low in the previous years. 

I think that protocols that are currently bridging with the U.S. financial system is probably a safe bet for a tremendous return in 2025-2026.

#Altcoins Turn Bull after Longest Bear Market

It's been an absolutely horrific bear markets for altcoins and a lot of expectations have crushed in the past quarter.

I've spend all my time figuring out what has happened. Indicators show green.

Let's discuss them

Over the past months, this is the time that I'm most confident about the pathway towards the bullrun for #Altcoins. 

A lot of people will be caught off-guard as the complexity has increased, but I'm happy to be betting on key protocols in the ecosystem.

The #Altcoin market capitalization (OTHERS) against $BTC is currently providing a massive bullish divergence.

The last time this bullish divergence was provided, was the actual low on altcoins in '19.

#Bitcoin valued against Gold hasn't even made an all-time high as of yet.

That being said, the real bull on risk-on assets hasn't really started.

It's approx. 30% away from the previous high in 2021. 

That's a great perspective.

The last time the #Altcoin market capitalization produced a bullish divergence, it was the reversal.

This is the longest bullish divergence in history.

Good riddance with #Bitcoin.

Massive breakout above $87K resulting into a strong move.

I expect 1-2 weeks of consolidation before the next big breakout occurs, and that should be $100K.
